I am a data engineer at [NCX](https://ncx.com) where I spend my days writing
code to run our natural capital marketplace. I have learned everything I know
about programming from open-source developers, my coworkers at NCX, my
classmates at OSU, and the many helpful and kind strangers that post their
questions/answers/ideas on the internet.

[NCX](https://ncx.com) | Data Engineer | Jan 2021 - present

  - clouds: AWS and Azure
  - CI/CD on GitHub Actions
- Work with data scientists to deploy machine learning and Bayesian statistical

  - R packages: `brms`, `tidyverse`, `furrr`, `future`

- Build systems up from POC to production
